page.title: 16CHATEAU PLAISIR AND SANDS
page.content:
CHATEAU PLAISIR
This famous Jersey night spot is found at the north end of La Grande Route des Mielles. Here you can see a show, have a meal or just enjoy a drink with friends.
The cabaret is on six nights a week. There are two comedians, dancers, a singer and backing group. It only costs Â£4.00 or less (Â£1.00 for children). Capacity is 350 to 400.
SANDS
This disco is on the other side of the road to Chateau Plaisir and is for the younger people. There is a light show and all the latest records of Duran Duran, Boomtown Rats, Frankie Goes to Hollywood and many others are played.
